entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. My name is Ashley, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a couple of weeks ago and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. I can definitely help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's [customer email address]. And hurry it up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. Okay, I see your order here. You purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date of purchase - 15 days prior to call]. What is the reason for your return?
It's just not what I expected. The heart rate monitor is inaccurate, and frankly, it's a piece of junk. I want my money back.
I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse did not meet your expectations. According to our return policy, you have 90 days to return an item for a full refund.
90 days? Okay, great! So, what's the next step?

I'm glad I could clarify our return policy. To proceed, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Simply repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund. This should take approximately 7-10 business days to reflect on your original payment method.
Fantastic! That sounds easy enough. So, I just need to look out for the email with the label. What happens if I don't have the original box?

That is not a problem at all. Just pack it securely in any box. As long as the VeloBand Pulse is protected during shipping, we're good. Now regarding the smart watch, do you happen to have all the original packaging and accessories that came with the VeloBand Pulse?
Yeah, I think I still have everything. Great! You've been a big help. I appreciate you not making me jump through hoops. Other companies would have given me a hard time.

You're very welcome! I'm happy I could assist you. Just to confirm, the prepaid shipping label will be sent to [customer email address]. Please let us know if you encounter any issues. I've made a note on your account regarding this VeloBand Pulse return.
Perfect. Thank you so much! Have a great day.
You too! Thank you for contacting VeloFit, and have a wonderful day.
